Vector Website

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page builder.

Pegasus

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Pegasus

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page builder.

Maecenas at justo id velit placerat molestie. Donec dictum lectus non odio. Cras a ante vitae enim iaculis aliquam. Mauris nunc quam, venenatis nec, euismod sit amet, egestas placerat, est.

Juice

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.

[/tatsu_inline_text][be_portfolio_details style= "style2" alignment= "left" key= "fwb8gr370ddbypfr"][/be_portfolio_details][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]

Juice

Exponent WordPress theme is insanely flexible and amazingly easy to use. This alone would be enough for a 5 star rating. On top of a great tool is even better customer support.

Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.Over 30 quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.

The Brief

Proin facilisis varius nunc. Curabitur eros risus, ultrices et dui ut, luctus accumsan nibh. Fusce convallis sapien placerat tellus suscipit vehicula. Ea mei nostrum imperdiet deterruisset, mei ludus efficiendi ei. Sea summo mazim ex, ea errem eleifend definitionem vim. A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/startup/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2018/08/exp-blog-08.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "4379" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" max_width= '{"d":"100%"}' rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "1" placeholder_bg= "rgba(238,238,238,1)" image_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' key= "fuag396ck62i7w4q"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396d8taf2abe"]

Smartphone penertration is growing by 2000% each year

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos. It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

'{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396f8945b7j5"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396g3kd6lzid"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396gtrfvfcg7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396hk278roj0"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namelySlider Revolution andMaster Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag396ic89dz4ww"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

n

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

n

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's
n

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

A Beautiful and Functional theme

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

What makes Oshine one of the bestselling WordPress themes of all time ?

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos. It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

  • Instant Start - Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.
  • Premium Design - Over 30 high quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
  • Visual Builder - Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page & header builder.
  • Great Performance - Optimized code for blazing fast loading times. Great for SEO as well as your website visitors.
  • Simple & Powerful - Take complete control of your website using a powerful yet simple to use system, a rare combination.
  • Trustworthy - Crafted with care by the authors of Oshine, a best seller with over 25K customers.
  • Quality Service - Get prompt responses from a friendly, professional and knowledgable support team.

'{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665753anw686"]

A Revolutionary Fully Visual Page Builder for WordPress.

A Powerful and Elegant live front end page builder for WordPress, that comes with 50+ styling modules, a live text editor and pre-built concepts. It makes building web pages a breeze and is loved by newbies and pros alike.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" bg_color= "" border_radius= "0" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fubh6658qkg815ny"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= "rgba(246,246,246,1)" bg_image= "" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"50px 50px 50px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border_radius= "0" border= '{"d":"1px 1px 1px 1px "}' border_color= "rgba(228,228,228,1)" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "0" overlay_color= "" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "0" box_shadow_custom= "0 0 15px 0 rgba(198,202,202,0.4)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fubh665c8t1nqocu"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665cdwbwt6r5"]
Top Notch Customer Support

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665dhp7yif3e"]
50+ Styling Modules

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665edmbqjdn"]
BlogLayouts

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665f7vbavpxe"]
Premium Slider Plugins worth $45

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namelySlider Revolution andMaster Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/startup/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2018/08/exp-blog-08.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "4379" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" max_width= '{"d":"100%"}' rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "0" placeholder_bg= "" image_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' key= "fubh665g552rjhhf"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665h0f4xp60u"]
One Page / Single Page websites

It is so easy to build one page websites orlanding pages using Oshine. Simply build a normal page with various sections using our Tatsu page builder and link them from the main menu to have them scroll smoothly to the respective sections. Why buy a specialised one page theme or landing page tool, when you have so many pre built pages and demos, any of which can be transformed in a single page website. FYI our landing page has been built using our theme.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665i1eky1ic"]
Hero Sections

Stun users the moment they enter your site with a big , bold & beautiful showcase fullscreen sliders or images or background videos. Parallax and Overlays are supported

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665j032mr3u3"]
Video Backgrounds

If a picture is worth a 1000 words, then what about a video ? Communicate to your visitors quickly and efficiently using subtle background videos.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665k717r02n0"]
Developer Friendly

The numerous options in the theme ensure that you usually don't have to code anything to customize the theme. However there are cases where you may want to extend the theme's functionality and it is quite easy to do so. The theme follows best coding practices, provides hooks and filters that allow you to customize the code using thechild theme. We have a custom CSS, JS & PHP snippet glossary with code for many common requests that we have provided to customers. The easy of use combined with the flexibility to extend / modify functionalities using custom code makes Oshine the go to theme of many agencies and professionals who develop websites for clients.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665lb0f09k77"]
Trusted Brand with over 20000+ customers

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_call_to_action bg_color= '{"angle":"45","colorPositions":{"0":"rgba(33,22,243,1)","100":"rgba(35,166,247,1)"}}' title= "Build a beautiful website using Oshine" h_tag= "h4" title_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' button_text= "Buy Now" button_link= "https://themeforest.net/item/oshine-creative-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/9545812" new_tab= "0" button_bg_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' hover_bg_color= "rgba(255,255,255,0)" color= '{"id":"palette:0","color":"rgba(34,147,215,1)"}' hover_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' border_width= "1" border_color= "#ffffff" hover_border_color= "#ffffff" lightbox= "0" image= "" video_url= "" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" key= "fubokm7xoh9ig5ve"][/tatsu_call_to_action][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]

A Beautiful and Functional theme

n

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

n

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

What makes Oshine one of the bestselling WordPress themes of all time ?
n

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos. It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

n
    n
  • Instant Start - Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.
    • n
  • Premium Design - Over 30 high quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
    • n
  • Visual Builder - Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page & header builder.
    • n
  • Great Performance - Optimized code for blazing fast loading times. Great for SEO as well as your website visitors.
    • n
  • Simple & Powerful - Take complete control of your website using a powerful yet simple to use system, a rare combination.
    • n
  • Trustworthy - Crafted with care by the authors of Oshine, a best seller with over 25K customers.
    • n
  • Quality Service - Get prompt responses from a friendly, professional and knowledgable support team.
    • n

Top Notch Customer Support
n

Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

One Page / Single Page websites
n

It is so easy to build one page websites orlanding pages using Oshine. Simply build a normal page with various sections using our Tatsu page builder and link them from the main menu to have them scroll smoothly to the respective sections. Why buy a specialised one page theme or landing page tool, when you have so many pre built pages and demos, any of which can be transformed in a single page website. FYI our landing page has been built using our theme.

Developer Friendly
n

The numerous options in the theme ensure that you usually don't have to code anything to customize the theme. However there are cases where you may want to extend the theme's functionality and it is quite easy to do so. The theme follows best coding practices, provides hooks and filters that allow you to customize the code using thechild theme. We have a custom CSS, JS & PHP snippet glossary with code for many common requests that we have provided to customers. The easy of use combined with the flexibility to extend / modify functionalities using custom code makes Oshine the go to theme of many agencies and professionals who develop websites for clients.

A Beautiful and Functional theme

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

What makes Oshine one of the bestselling WordPress themes of all time ?

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos.  It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000’s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

  • Instant Start - Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.
  • Premium Design - Over 30 high quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
  • Visual Builder - Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page & header builder.
  • Great Performance - Optimized code for blazing fast loading times. Great for SEO as well as your website visitors.
  • Simple & Powerful - Take complete control of your website using a powerful yet simple to use system, a rare combination.
  • Trustworthy -  Crafted with care by the authors of Oshine, a best seller with over 25K customers.
  • Quality Service - Get prompt responses from a friendly, professional and knowledgable support team.

Top Notch Customer Support

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

BlogLayouts

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665f7vbavpxe"]
Premium Slider Plugins worth $45

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namelySlider Revolution andMaster Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/corporate/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/08/smartmockups_jkw9oqh9.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "4481" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "0" placeholder_bg= "" image_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' key= "fubh665g552rjhhf"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665h0f4xp60u"]
One Page / Single Page websites

It is so easy to build one page websites orlanding pages using Oshine. Simply build a normal page with various sections using our Tatsu page builder and link them from the main menu to have them scroll smoothly to the respective sections. Why buy a specialised one page theme or landing page tool, when you have so many pre built pages and demos, any of which can be transformed in a single page website. FYI our landing page has been built using our theme.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665i1eky1ic"]
Hero Sections

Stun users the moment they enter your site with a big , bold & beautiful showcase fullscreen sliders or images or background videos. Parallax and Overlays are supported

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665j032mr3u3"]
Video Backgrounds

If a picture is worth a 1000 words, then what about a video ? Communicate to your visitors quickly and efficiently using subtle background videos.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665k717r02n0"]
Developer Friendly

The numerous options in the theme ensure that you usually don't have to code anything to customize the theme. However there are cases where you may want to extend the theme's functionality and it is quite easy to do so. The theme follows best coding practices, provides hooks and filters that allow you to customize the code using thechild theme. We have a custom CSS, JS & PHP snippet glossary with code for many common requests that we have provided to customers. The easy of use combined with the flexibility to extend / modify functionalities using custom code makes Oshine the go to theme of many agencies and professionals who develop websites for clients.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fubh665lb0f09k77"]
Trusted Brand with over 20000+ customers

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_call_to_action bg_color= '{"angle":"45","colorPositions":{"0":"rgba(33,22,243,1)","100":"rgba(35,166,247,1)"}}' title= "Build a beautiful website using Oshine" h_tag= "h4" title_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' button_text= "Buy Now" button_link= "https://themeforest.net/item/oshine-creative-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/9545812" new_tab= "0" button_bg_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' hover_bg_color= "rgba(255,255,255,0)" color= '{"id":"palette:0","color":"rgba(34,147,215,1)"}' hover_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' border_width= "1" border_color= "#ffffff" hover_border_color= "#ffffff" lightbox= "0" image= "" video_url= "" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" key= "fubokm7xoh9ig5ve"][/tatsu_call_to_action][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]

By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

'{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dwy4b5oamb6"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dwzpmainmcp"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx10kd895rn"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" bg_color= "" border_radius= "0" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fuag2dx5ah2f49k7"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= "rgba(250,250,250,1)" bg_image= "" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "center center" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"70px 50px 70px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border_radius= "0" border= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_color= "" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "1" overlay_color= "rgba(0,0,0,0.4)" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "0" box_shadow_custom= "0 0 15px 0 rgba(198,202,202,0.4)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "fuag2dx9om3t2tef"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 20px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx9wofawza1"]

Oculus Pro set us debut in CES 2019

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_button button_text= "See the specs" url= "" new_tab= "0" type= "medium" button_style= "circular" alignment= "center" bg_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' hover_bg_color= "" color= '{"id":"palette:2","color":"rgba(49,50,51,1)"}' hover_color= "" border_width= "0" border_color= "" hover_border_color= "" icon= "" icon_alignment= "left" lightbox= "0" image= "" video_url= "" hover_effect= "none" background_animation= "none" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= "0px 0px 40px 0px" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" hover_box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" key= "fuag2dxbae8nkj6t"][/tatsu_button][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx2aj43co9z"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namelySlider Revolution andMaster Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2dx3opc05gou"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

[/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]
item.excerpt:encoded: Imagination is more important than intelligence. If you can imagine it, you can build it, said Albert Einstein. With VR, every kid can get the power of imagination. Its sure to revolutionize learning.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

The web has become complicated with a lot of intrusion on personal data. Thus several countries have stepped up regulations on how companies can use the data of their users. There are also heavy penalties for companies which misuse user data or allow it to be misused intentionally or unintentionally. Though the privacy policy has to be worded in simple terms that your users can understand, it is also pivotal that you protect yourself against legal liabilities.

The web has become complicated with a lot of intrusion on personal data. Thus several countries have stepped up regulations on how companies can use the data of their users. There are also heavy penalties for companies which misuse user data or allow it to be misused intentionally or unintentionally. Though the privacy policy has to be worded in simple terms that your users can understand, it is also pivotal that you protect yourself against legal liabilities.

The web has become complicated with a lot of intrusion on personal data. Thus several countries have stepped up regulations on how companies can use the data of their users. There are also heavy penalties for companies which misuse user data or allow it to be misused intentionally or unintentionally. Though the privacy policy has to be worded in simple terms that your users can understand, it is also pivotal that you protect yourself against legal liabilities.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.
[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vccrc48u0ub"]

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/startup/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2018/08/exp-blog-12.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "4383" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" max_width= '{"d":"100%"}' rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "1" placeholder_bg= "rgba(238,238,238,1)" image_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' key= "fu9k1vce7ddt4me5"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vceyfdpz8r9"]
What makes Oshine one of the bestselling WordPress themes of all time ?

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos. It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

  • Instant Start - Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.
  • Premium Design - Over 30 high quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
  • Visual Builder - Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page & header builder.
  • Great Performance - Optimized code for blazing fast loading times. Great for SEO as well as your website visitors.
  • Simple & Powerful - Take complete control of your website using a powerful yet simple to use system, a rare combination.
  • Trustworthy - Crafted with care by the authors of Oshine, a best seller with over 25K customers.
  • Quality Service - Get prompt responses from a friendly, professional and knowledgable support team.

"fu9k1vcod08u70f"]
Premium Slider Plugins worth $45

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namelySlider Revolution andMaster Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vcpuv88lta5"]
One Page / Single Page websites

It is so easy to build one page websites orlanding pages using Oshine. Simply build a normal page with various sections using our Tatsu page builder and link them from the main menu to have them scroll smoothly to the respective sections. Why buy a specialised one page theme or landing page tool, when you have so many pre built pages and demos, any of which can be transformed in a single page website. FYI our landing page has been built using our theme.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vcqq1c8t74l"]
Hero Sections

Stun users the moment they enter your site with a big , bold & beautiful showcase fullscreen sliders or images or background videos. Parallax and Overlays are supported

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" bg_color= "" border_radius= "0" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "rJgornPZLX"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= "rgba(246,246,246,1)" bg_image= "" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"50px 50px 50px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border_radius= "0" border= '{"d":"1px 1px 1px 1px "}' border_color= "rgba(228,228,228,1)" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "0" overlay_color= "" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "0" box_shadow_custom= "0 0 15px 0 rgba(198,202,202,0.4)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "H1jrhDZ87"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SJZVU3D-IX"]
Top Notch Customer Support

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkgVL2Pb87"]
50+ Styling Modules

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ry4InD-87"]
BlogLayouts

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vcrhfccce15"]
Video Backgrounds

If a picture is worth a 1000 words, then what about a video ? Communicate to your visitors quickly and efficiently using subtle background videos.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vcs89ap6crj"]
Developer Friendly

The numerous options in the theme ensure that you usually don't have to code anything to customize the theme. However there are cases where you may want to extend the theme's functionality and it is quite easy to do so. The theme follows best coding practices, provides hooks and filters that allow you to customize the code using thechild theme. We have a custom CSS, JS & PHP snippet glossary with code for many common requests that we have provided to customers. The easy of use combined with the flexibility to extend / modify functionalities using custom code makes Oshine the go to theme of many agencies and professionals who develop websites for clients.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vct9u6upz1j"]
Trusted Brand with over 20000+ customers

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_call_to_action bg_color= '{"angle":"45","colorPositions":{"0":"rgba(33,22,243,1)","100":"rgba(35,166,247,1)"}}' title= "Build a beautiful website using Oshine" h_tag= "h4" title_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' button_text= "Buy Now" button_link= "https://themeforest.net/item/oshine-creative-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/9545812" new_tab= "0" button_bg_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' hover_bg_color= "rgba(255,255,255,0)" color= '{"id":"palette:0","color":"rgba(34,147,215,1)"}' hover_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' border_width= "1" border_color= "#ffffff" hover_border_color= "#ffffff" lightbox= "0" image= "" video_url= "" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" key= "S1J3S2zIm"][/tatsu_call_to_action][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]
item.excerpt:encoded: A Powerful and Elegant live front end page builder for WordPress, that comes with 50+ styling modules, a live text editor and pre-built concepts. It makes building web pages a breeze and is loved by newbies and pros alike.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

What makes Oshine one of the bestselling WordPress themes of all time ?
n

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos. It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

n
    n
  • Instant Start - Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.
    • n
  • Premium Design - Over 30 high quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
    • n
  • Visual Builder - Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page & header builder.
    • n
  • Great Performance - Optimized code for blazing fast loading times. Great for SEO as well as your website visitors.
    • n
  • Simple & Powerful - Take complete control of your website using a powerful yet simple to use system, a rare combination.
    • n
  • Trustworthy - Crafted with care by the authors of Oshine, a best seller with over 25K customers.
    • n

One Page / Single Page websites
n

It is so easy to build one page websites orlanding pages using Oshine. Simply build a normal page with various sections using our Tatsu page builder and link them from the main menu to have them scroll smoothly to the respective sections. Why buy a specialised one page theme or landing page tool, when you have so many pre built pages and demos, any of which can be transformed in a single page website. FYI our landing page has been built using our theme.

n

Developer Friendly
n

The numerous options in the theme ensure that you usually don't have to code anything to customize the theme. However there are cases where you may want to extend the theme's functionality and it is quite easy to do so. The theme follows best coding practices, provides hooks and filters that allow you to customize the code using thechild theme. We have a custom CSS, JS & PHP snippet glossary with code for many common requests that we have provided to customers. The easy of use combined with the flexibility to extend / modify functionalities using custom code makes Oshine the go to theme of many agencies and professionals who develop websites for clients.

What makes Oshine one of the bestselling WordPress themes of all time ?

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos. It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

  • Instant Start - Get started swiftly & easily by importing a demo of your choice in a single click.
  • Premium Design - Over 30 high quality professionally designed pre-built website concepts to choose from.
  • Visual Builder - Build your website using a fully visual interface, using our revolutionary page & header builder.
  • Great Performance - Optimized code for blazing fast loading times. Great for SEO as well as your website visitors.
  • Simple & Powerful - Take complete control of your website using a powerful yet simple to use system, a rare combination.
  • Trustworthy - Crafted with care by the authors of Oshine, a best seller with over 25K customers.
  • Quality Service - Get prompt responses from a friendly, professional and knowledgable support team.

Premium Slider Plugins worth $45

One Page / Single Page websites

It is so easy to build one page websites orlanding pages using Oshine. Simply build a normal page with various sections using our Tatsu page builder and link them from the main menu to have them scroll smoothly to the respective sections. Why buy a specialised one page theme or landing page tool, when you have so many pre built pages and demos, any of which can be transformed in a single page website. FYI our landing page has been built using our theme.

Hero Sections

Stun users the moment they enter your site with a big , bold & beautiful showcase fullscreen sliders or images or background videos. Parallax and Overlays are supported

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inner_row no_margin_bottom= "0" equal_height_columns= "0" gutter= "medium" column_spacing= "px" swap_cols= "0" row_id= "" row_class= "" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "rJgornPZLX"][tatsu_inner_column bg_color= "rgba(246,246,246,1)" bg_image= "" bg_repeat= "no-repeat" bg_attachment= "scroll" bg_position= "top left" bg_size= "cover" padding= '{"d":"50px 50px 50px 50px "}' custom_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' border= '{"d":"1px 1px 1px 1px "}' border_color= "rgba(228,228,228,1)" bg_video= "0" bg_video_mp4_src= "" bg_video_ogg_src= "" bg_video_webm_src= "" bg_overlay= "0" overlay_color= "" animate_overlay= "none" link_overlay= "" vertical_align= "none" column_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' z_index= "0" column_parallax= "0" column_width= '{"d":100,"l":100,"t":100,"m":100}' column_mobile_spacing= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" col_id= "" column_class= "" enable_box_shadow= "0" box_shadow_custom= "0 0 15px 0 rgba(198,202,202,0.4)" hide_in= "0" layout= "1/1" key= "H1jrhDZ87"][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SJZVU3D-IX"]
Top Notch Customer Support

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkgVL2Pb87"]
50+ Styling Modules

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ry4InD-87"]
BlogLayouts

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vcrhfccce15"]
Video Backgrounds

If a picture is worth a 1000 words, then what about a video ? Communicate to your visitors quickly and efficiently using subtle background videos.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vcs89ap6crj"]
Developer Friendly

The numerous options in the theme ensure that you usually don't have to code anything to customize the theme. However there are cases where you may want to extend the theme's functionality and it is quite easy to do so. The theme follows best coding practices, provides hooks and filters that allow you to customize the code using thechild theme. We have a custom CSS, JS & PHP snippet glossary with code for many common requests that we have provided to customers. The easy of use combined with the flexibility to extend / modify functionalities using custom code makes Oshine the go to theme of many agencies and professionals who develop websites for clients.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fu9k1vct9u6upz1j"]
Trusted Brand with over 20000+ customers

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_call_to_action bg_color= '{"angle":"45","colorPositions":{"0":"rgba(33,22,243,1)","100":"rgba(35,166,247,1)"}}' title= "Build a beautiful website using Oshine" h_tag= "h4" title_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' button_text= "Buy Now" button_link= "https://themeforest.net/item/oshine-creative-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/9545812" new_tab= "0" button_bg_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' hover_bg_color= "rgba(255,255,255,0)" color= '{"id":"palette:0","color":"rgba(34,147,215,1)"}' hover_color= '{"id":"palette:1","color":"#ffffff"}' border_width= "1" border_color= "#ffffff" hover_border_color= "#ffffff" lightbox= "0" image= "" video_url= "" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px"}' box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" key= "S1J3S2zIm"][/tatsu_call_to_action][/tatsu_column][/tatsu_row][/tatsu_section]

The web has become complicated with a lot of intrusion on personal data. Thus several countries have stepped up regulations on how companies can use the data of their users. There are also heavy penalties for companies which misuse user data or allow it to be misused intentionally or unintentionally. Though the privacy policy has to be worded in simple terms that your users can understand, it is also pivotal that you protect yourself against legal liabilities.

There is no room for ambiguity, it can cost you millions. Better safe than sorry.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "Sk_IxUlUQ"]

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "Skxdl8eI7"]

Attorney, Montana Legal Clinic

[/tatsu_inline_text][/tatsu_inner_column][/tatsu_inner_row][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SkdrbIlLm"]

Things you should cover in your privacy policy

Donec dis imperdiet ut consequat ullamcorper vitae nulla. Dapibus neque sit parturient cras nec imperdiet semper elit dui quam. Sit imperdiet eleifend ut ultricies elit et hendrerit rhoncus neque nisi vitae parturient orci. Integer adipiscing metus eros sit nisi nullam ultricies aliquam.

  1. All the cookies you use and for what purpose
  2. What are all the user related that you collect.
  3. Where is the user data stored and how it is processed.
  4. Disclose 3rd parties that can collect your user data and in that case how they store and process it.
  5. Provide a mechanism for your users to access their stored data.
  6. Provide your users the ability to delete their data.
[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HJjT_HxU7"]

Long tail innovator social media scrum project growth hacking non-disclosure agreement partner network analytics customer social proof termsheet release early adopters low hanging fruit. Founders creative network effects interaction design crowdsource research & development facebook business plan technology early adopters funding hackathon handshake.

The web has become complicated with a lot of intrusion on personal data. Thus several countries have stepped up regulations on how companies can use the data of their users. There are also heavy penalties for companies which misuse user data or allow it to be misused intentionally or unintentionally. Though the privacy policy has to be worded in simple terms that your users can understand, it is also pivotal that you protect yourself against legal liabilities.

A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkiWH6IH7"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "B1ob-C8BQ"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SyXGZA8S7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ByHSW08SX"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namelySlider Revolution andMaster Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SkW6WC8S7"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

A super-computer that fits in your pocket.

Oshine is a popular, creative WordPress theme used by 20500+ customers across the world. From Portfolio, Photography, Agency, Blog, Architecture, Business or Shop, build beautiful websites for any purpose with ease.

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_image image= "https://brandexponents.com/exponent-lite/corporate/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/08/exp-blog-027.jpg" image_varying_size_src= "" alignment= "none" border_width= "0" border_color= "" id= "" size= "full" adaptive_image= "0" rebel= "0" width= '{"d":"100%"}' shadow= "none" border_radius= "0px" lazy_load= "1" placeholder_bg= "rgba(238,238,238,1)" image_offset= "0" offset= '{"d":"0px 0px"}' lightbox= "0" link= "" new_tab= "0" animate= "0" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" enable_margin= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' key= "S1UXZFLrX"][/tatsu_image][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 60px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "S1TuM9LBX"]

Smartphone penertration is growing by 2000% each year

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos. It has been the #1 choice of creative professionals for presenting their portfolios. 1000s of creatives across the world, from Photographers, Graphic Designers, Web Designers, Artists, Videographers, Makeup artists, Musicians, Freelancers, and even Models, have used Oshine to create their portfolio websites and have enjoyed great success.

padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "HkiWH6IH7"]
More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "B1ob-C8BQ"]
OS that's improving each year

Oshine comes packed with over 50 shortcode modules to help style your content in a plethora of ways. They are integrated with the page builder for easy use.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SyXGZA8S7"]
Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 30px 0px"}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "ByHSW08SX"]
Video and Content Streaming

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namelySlider Revolution andMaster Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "SkW6WC8S7"]
Improved multi-tasking and gaming experience

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?

We are on the verge of the next green revolution. Except this time it is being driven by robots. A number of IOT devices are being developed that can automate most of the processes. Drones to monitor crop quality, pests, water levels etc enhacing farm output.
[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2v4meo4q1hdo"]

Oshine is also used by a wide range of businesses including corporates, architects, design & development agencies, PR companies, hotels, shops, blogs, restaurants, apps and startups. By combining beautiful designs & layouts with powerful options, Oshine lets you build any kind of website starting from simple portfolio websites to full blown ecommerce, multi-lingual websites, without any coding involved. Inspite of being powerful & flexible, Oshine is quite easy to use, which is why it is loved by beginners and advanced users alike.

Farm output is doubling each year

Oshine is a clean & modern, creative wordpress theme that comes with 43 stunning demos. More RAM and SSD Storage than most entry level PC's

One of the best aspects of the theme is not the theme ifself, but the support that comes along with it. Don't take our word for it. Hundreds of reviews from our customers say so. Our in-house support team is friendly and professional and usually go out of the way to help you with your requests. Our core developers are also a part of our support team and any reported issues / bugs are quickly patched up. 6 months of Free Support ( Email based ) is included with your purchase.

Gigabit 5G Connections

Choose betweenmasonry, medium or large thumbnail layouts and play with title & meta variations to arrive at the best way to present your blog. Supports Gallery, Video, Audio, Quote and Link Post Formats and comes with in built Social Sharing.

Two of the best selling slider plugins of all time, namelySlider Revolution andMaster Slider plugins have been included with the theme for free. Create multi-layer responsive slides with terrific transitions and animations.

[/tatsu_inline_text][tatsu_inline_text max_width= '{"d":"100"}' wrap_alignment= "center" text_alignment= '{"d":"left"}' animate= "" animation_type= "fadeIn" animation_delay= "0" margin= '{"d":"0px 0px 50px 0px "}' bg_color= "" box_shadow= "0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0)" padding= '{"d":"0px 0px 0px 0px"}' border_radius= "0px" key= "fuag2v4ucb7tyhel"]

Purchase our theme with confidence knowing that you are buying a product that is being used by over19000 customers and has been constantly updated and supported for nearly 3 years. We are among the top 100 authors among 1M+ creatives across the globe and have reached the monumental $1 Million in sales. Oshine is one of thetop 25 bestselling themes of all time and has been a consistent weekly top seller ever since its launch. You get 10000+ hours of design and development, plus regular updates & new features for a one time cost of just $59. Great Investment isn't it ?
